title: Majh Rastar Meye
description:
Old friends Saswata Chatterjee and Debleena Dutt have decided to shed their inhibitions for the telefilm Majhrastar Meye, directed by Suman Das. The duo are gearing up to shoot a Ã¢â‚¬Å“very boldÃ¢â‚¬ï¿½ scene in bed!

Majhrastar Meye is about Runa (Debleena), a schoolteacher, and Sid (Saswata), a fashion photographer, who have long been in love. But an element of boredom has crept into their relationship. Ã¢â‚¬Å“ThatÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s when Runa and Sid decide to play a game of lust. I think the concept is very realistic. Such things happen to couples who lose interest in each other after being together for a long time,Ã¢â‚¬ï¿½ says Debleena.

Her co-star is tired of beating around the bush when it comes to expressing love on screen. Ã¢â‚¬Å“How long will we show birds and bees in love scenes? The world has moved on and we should portray intimate scenes realistically.... Majhrastar Meye has a very bold climax scene. Even the dialogues are bold,Ã¢â‚¬ï¿½ says Saswata.

But wonÃ¢â‚¬â„¢t their boldness make their audience shift in their seats? Ã¢â‚¬Å“After 14 years of being in the TV industry, I can assure you that my audience will accept me in whatever I do,Ã¢â‚¬ï¿½ says a confident Debleena. Ã¢â‚¬Å“For me, saying Ã¢â‚¬ËœI love youÃ¢â‚¬â„¢ is the same as unbuttoning the heroineÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s kurti,Ã¢â‚¬ï¿½ says Saswata, matter-of-factly. The two have already shot some portions in Maithan.

Majhrastar Meye will be aired in the late-night Prapto Monoskoder Jonnyo slot on Rupashi Bangla.
